thread.title: 'Tonight' host Jimmy Fallon falls again, hurts fingers on his other hand
thread.title_full: 'Tonight' host Jimmy Fallon falls again, hurts fingers on his other hand

title: 'Tonight' host Jimmy Fallon falls again, hurts fingers on his other hand
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION 'Tonight' host Jimmy Fallon falls again, hurts fingers on his other hand By: The Associated Press Report Error 
BOSTON - Jimmy Fallon should probably be more careful. 
Four months after the "Tonight Show" host needed emergency surgery to save one of his fingers after a fall, Fallon hurt his other hand in a spill at a party in his honour on Saturday. 
Fallon tweeted a picture Sunday of his hand with a couple small bandages on his fingers, writing that it was "nothing a few band aids couldn't fix." 
The "Saturday Night Live" alum needed to have a vein taken from his foot over the summer to repair the injured finger on his left hand. He said his wedding ring got caught when he tried to break his fall after tripping on a rug. 
Fallon had received a humour award from the Harvard Lampoon in Boston earlier Saturday. Rate this This article has not yet been rated. We want you to tell us what you think of our articles.
